title: Bagel
description:
The brown bread of a bagel, shown sliced in two halves. Some platforms depict seeds, as sesame or poppy, and a schmear of cream cheese, with the bagel assembled as a sandwich. May resemble the Doughnut at small sizes.

After complaints, Apple updated the bagel emoji design during the iOS 12.1 beta cycle.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's bagel emoji is a delightfully textured representation, featuring a golden-brown, slightly uneven surface with visible sesame seeds scattered across its glossy exterior. The soft, rounded shape and the subtle highlights from realistic lighting give it a warm and inviting appearance, characteristic of Apple's food emoji designs. This emoji is commonly used to represent breakfast, a simple snack, or to share a craving for this beloved baked good on Apple devices.
